揃いも揃って不揃いの世界観に\r\n: Everyone lining up in this mismatched worldview
お揃いの幼稚さに辟易な恒例\r\n: Sick of the childishness that everyone shares
催しの奴隷 夜通し踊れ\r\n: Slaves of the festival, dance all night long
条例処刑フォーメーションで褒美を獲れ\r\n: Get the reward in formation for legal execution

邪気に飲まれ制御不能 (Ah ha)\r\n: Swallowed by malice, out of control (Ah ha)
異議マイナス陰気バイラル意に介さず\r\n: Negative objections and gloomy virals don’t matter
浮かび上がり回る月に針が落ちる (Waaah!)\r\n: The needle drops on the spinning moon (Waaah!)
大きな口で笑うカボチャたちが歌う (Waaah!)\r\n: The laughing pumpkins sing with wide grins (Waaah!)

こうなればあとは思いのまま\r\n: Now, everything will go as you wish
スケアクロウも飛び跳ね廻る\r\n: Even the scarecrows jump and twirl

くるくる狂おしい高まり\r\n: Spinning round and round, a maddening excitement
